const data = {
    products:
        [{
            _id:1,
            name: 'Slim Shirt',
            category: 'Shirts',
            image: '/images/d1.jpg',
            price: 60,
            brand: 'Nike',
            rating: 4.1,
            numReviews: 10,
            countInStock:6
        },
        {
            _id:2,
            name: 'Fit Shirt',
            category: 'Shirts',
            image: '/images/d1.jpg',
            price: 33,
            brand: 'Nike',
            rating: 4.2,
            numReviews: 10,
            countInStock: 3
        },
        {
            _id:3,
            name: 'Best Pants',
            category: 'Pants',
            image: '/images/d1.jpg',
            price: 55,
            brand: 'Nike',
            rating: 4.5,
            numReviews: 10,
            countInStock: 4
        },
        {
            _id:4,
            name: 'Best Pants',
            category: 'Pants',
            image: '/images/d1.jpg',
            price: 55,
            brand: 'Nike',
            rating: 4.5,
            numReviews: 10,
            countInStock: 5
        },
        {
            _id:5,
            name: 'Best Pants',
            category: 'Pants',
            image: '/images/d1.jpg',
            price: 55,
            brand: 'Nike',
            rating: 4.5,
            numReviews: 10
        },
            {
                _id:6,
                name: 'Best Pants',
                category: 'Pants',
                image: '/images/d1.jpg',
                price: 55,
                brand: 'Nike',
                rating: 4.5,

            }
        ]
}
export default data;
